product_name: Mountain Khakis Lodge Wool Jacket - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Stay warm and look smart in the slightly tailored fit of the men's Lodge Wool Jacket from Mountain Khakis. It's made from a burly merino wool blend that's highly wind- and water-resistant. Merino wool/polyester/modal blend is tough and stylish. Soft merino wool is naturally warm, breathable and water resistant. Zippered handwarmer pockets and chest pocket; internal chest pocket. Lycra(R)-bound cuffs and high collar keeps weather out and warmth in. Men's Lodge Wool Jacket from Mountain Khakis features a casual fit. Closeout.
short_description: Stay warm and look smart in the slightly tailored fit of the men's Lodge Wool Jacket from Mountain Khakis. It's made from a burly merino wool blend that's highly wind- and water-resistant.
